plot: Being special guests at the first underwater resort excites Ben and Gwen till they meet the owner's snobbish grandson and a plethora of vicious undersea aliens.

The Tennysons get the VIP treatment when Grandpa Max's millionaire friend, Donovan Grand Smith, invites them to his soon-to-open undersea resort in the Bermuda Triangle. Donovan's warm hospitality is offset by his disdainful grandson, Edwin. Still, the visit has appeal up until a relentless multitude of aggressive undersea aliens responsible for the area's bad reputation attacks.—statmanjeff
